feat.title: Action Recovery
feat.benefit: When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you can make a saving throw against each effect on you that a save can end. Take the extra action after you have made all saving throws.

feat.title: Action Rush
feat.benefit: When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you can shift 2 squares as a free action either before or after taking the extra action.

feat.title: Action Surge
feat.benefit: You gain a +3 bonus to attack rolls you make during any extra action you gain by spending an action point.

feat.title: Arcane Reserves
feat.benefit: If all your arcane encounter attack powers are expended, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with your arcane at-will attack powers until the end of your encounter or until you regain the use of one or more of your arcane encounter attack powers.
This bonus increases to +3 at 21st level.

feat.title: Avenging Opportunist
feat.benefit: The first time in an encounter when you reduce your oath target to 0 hit points or less, you gain an extra move action that you must be used before the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Avenging Spirit
feat.benefit: When an ally of your level or higher is reduced to 0 hit points or fewer, you gain an action point that must be used before the end of your next turn or it is lost.
You must see or hear the ally when he or she is reduced to 0 hit points or fewer to gain this feat's benefits.

feat.title: Bloody Tenacity
feat.benefit: The first time you are bloodied in an encounter, you gain a +2 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Bogtangle Heritage
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to Nature checks.
In addition, you gain the bog hunter's poison power.

power.title: Bog Hunter's Poison
power.fluff: You carefully apply to a weapon a poison that you extracted from local flora and fauna during a rest

section.name: Target:
section.text: One weapon

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The next attack with the weapon that hits before the end of the encounter deals an extra ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends).

section.name: Each failed saving throw:
section.text: The ongoing damage increases by 5, to a maximum of 15.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: The initial ongoing damage increases to 10, and the maximum to 25.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: The initial ongoing damage increases to 15, and the maximum to 35.

feat.title: Bogtangle Warrior
feat.benefit: You gain proficiency with the blowgun, and your blowgun damage increases from 1d4 to 1d6.
Also, you can swap one of your 1st-level at-will attack powers for the bogtangle dart attack power.

power.title: Bogtangle Dart
power.fluff: An enemy struck by your dart feels a spreading numbness as the venom does its work

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a blowgun

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity or Wisdom vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] poison damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
If the target is already slowed, it becomes immobilized until the end of your next turn instead.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2[W] poison damage.

feat.title: Crimson Eye Action
feat.benefit: When you spend an action point, you subject your assassin's shroud target to an additional shroud.

feat.title: Die Hard
feat.benefit: You gain a feat bonus to death saving throws equal to one-half your Constitution modifier. This bonus increases by +2 for each failed death saving throw you have made.
Also, you do not die until you have failed four death saving throws instead of three.

feat.title: Divine Approval
feat.benefit: When you use a Channel Divinity power, you can also make a saving throw against an effect that a save can end before resolving that power.

Starting at 21st level, if you are not affected by an effect that a save can end, you can make a saving throw to end any one condition on you, even if that condition cannot normally be ended by a save.

feat.title: Divine Perseverance
feat.benefit: When you succeed on a saving throw, you gain a +2 bonus to the first attack roll you make before the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Don't Count Me Out
feat.benefit: While you are bloodied, you gain a +2 bonus to saving throws against effects that immobilize, daze, stun, or weaken you.

feat.title: Eager Mind
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 bonus to Initiative.
In addition, you gain a +1 bonus to saving throws while you are bloodied.

feat.title: Foamgather Heritage
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to Endurance checks.
Also, you can hold your breath for twice as long as normal.
In addition, you gain the deft diver power.

power.title: Deft Diver
power.fluff: You move through the water like a fish and can make the most cumbersome weapons deadly underwater

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You swim a number of squares equal to your speed.
Until the end of your next turn, you take no penalties to attack rolls during aquatic combat for using a weapon other than a Spear or a Crossbow.

feat.title: Foamgather Warrior
feat.benefit: You gain proficiency with the net.
Also, you gain a +1 bonus to Weapon attack rolls with a net.
In addition, you swap one of your 1st-level at-will attack powers for the net snare attack power.

power.title: Net Snare
power.fluff: You catch an enemy in your net and maneuver it into position

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a net.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Your highest ability vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] damage, and the target is grabbed, and remains grabbed while within 2 squares of you. The grab automatically ends at the start of your next turn.
If you used this power as a melee attack, you slide the target 1 square. If you used it has a ranged attack, you pull the target 1 square.

feat.title: Foulborn Heritage
feat.benefit: You are a foulborn.
Your origin changes to aberrant instead of natural.
Also, you have the unbalanced mind power.

power.title: Unbalanced Mind
power.fluff: Your connection to the Far Realm unleashes psychic pain in response to attack

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You take damage

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you have an Aura 1 (Psionic, Psychic).
Any creature that enters the aura or ends its turn there takes 5 psychic damage. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 10 psychic damage.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 15 psychic damage.

feat.title: Frantic Recovery
feat.benefit: When you spend an action point, until the end of your next turn, you can use your second wind as a minor action.

feat.title: Heroes Make Their Own Luck
feat.benefit: When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you gain a +1 bonus to all defenses until the start of your next turn.

feat.title: Human Beast Mastery
feat.benefit: Your beast companion gains a +1 bonus to all defenses.

feat.title: Human Ingenuity
feat.benefit: When you spend an action point, you regain 1 power point.

feat.title: Human Innovation
feat.benefit: When you spend an action point, you can also use Impart Energy on an adjacent ally's magical item. This does not count towards how often you can use Arcane Empowerment, but does count against the number of times an item can be Imparted Energy in a day.

feat.title: Human Nature Lore
feat.benefit: When you make an Endurance check or a Nature check, you can roll twice and use either result.

feat.title: Human Perseverance
feat.benefit: You gain a +1 bonus to saving throws.

feat.title: Human Resolve
feat.benefit: When you spend an action point, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.
These temporary hit points increase to 4 + your Charisma modifier at 11th level, and to 8 + your Charisma modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Imperishable Destiny
feat.benefit: Each time you finish an encounter without expending your action point, you gain a cumulative +1 bonus to ability checks, skill checks, and saving throws. This bonus lasts until your next extended rest.

feat.title: Inspired Defense
feat.benefit: A character using the Draw Inspiration action of your warlord's aura also gains a +1 power bonus to all defenses until the start of his or her next turn.

feat.title: Invoke Resilience
feat.benefit: When you use a divine encounter attack or divine daily attack power on your turn, one ally within 10 squares of you gains a +2 power bonus to the first saving throw her or she makes before the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Pain Doesn't Hurt
feat.benefit: While you are bloodied, you gain a +2 bonus to saving throws against ongoing damage.
Also, the first time during an encounter that you become bloodied, you ignore ongoing damage until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Path of the Scarred
feat.benefit: You deal 1 extra fire damage with encounter attacks and daily attacks.
This extra fire damage increases to 2 at 11th level, and to 3 at 21st level.
If you have the Student of the Plague feat, the extra fire damage is 2, and increases to 3 at 11th level and to 5 at 21st level.

feat.title: Perfect Recovery
feat.benefit: When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you can end one effect on you that a save can end before resolving the action.
If you are not affected by an effect that a save can end, you can attempt a saving throw to end one effect that normally does not end on a save instead.

feat.title: Persistent Threat
feat.benefit: While you are dazed, you can still flank enemies, and you can take a single opportunity action if you haven't taken one since the start of your previous turn.

feat.title: Wrath of the Forester
feat.benefit: When you spend an action point to take an extra action, if you have already used your Nature's Wrath class feature during your current turn, you can use it a second time before the end of your turn.
